article: raising the competitive stakes to a rich new level in its world wide web `` browser '' war with the netscape communications corp. , the microsoft corp. announced deals late on monday providing for two of the internet 's most popular financial news and sports services to be bundled free into a new version of microsoft 's browsing software .
